description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time Trick</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Fleeting Time Trick in hand.
levelupDescription: You've <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predicted</style></link> 5+ times<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create 3 <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Chronobreaks</style></link> in your deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've Predicted 5+ times. When I level up, create 3 Chronobreaks in your deck.
flavorText: It's not about how much time you have, it's about how you spend it.
name: Ekko

description: Revive all allies that died this round, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Revive all allies that died this round, then Rally.
flavorText: "Once more, for the first time." - Ekko
name: Chronobreak

description:
Draw 1.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Parallel Convergence</style></link> in your deck.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ekko</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
Create a Parallel Convergence in your deck.
Create an Ekko in your deck.
flavorText: "Splitting the timelines..." - Ekko
name: Ekko's Called Shot

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> 0 cost <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time Trick</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Fleeting 0 cost Time Trick in hand.
flavorText: Ekko can't fix everyone's mistakes, but that'll never stop him from trying again, and again, and again, and...
name: Ekko

description: When you summon another <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chirean Sumpworker</style></link>, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> me and transform allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chirean Sumpworkers</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Sumpworks Posses</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another Chirean Sumpworker, Obliterate me and transform allied Chirean Sumpworkers everywhere into Sumpworks Posses.
flavorText: The first Zaunite miners to discover the chirean thought them timid, simple creatures. But as the years passed, and as they grew comfortable with humans, they slowly revealed their close societal bonds, and their seemingly native understanding of technology.
name: Chirean Sumpworker

description: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: It takes a lot to upset a group of chirean, but when they get mad, everyone's gonna know about it.
name: Circuit Breaker

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "They're sweet enough on their own, sure, but get a bunch of 'em together, and before you know it, they've built some madcap machine and are off knockin' down some part of the Lanes." - Zaunite machinist
name: Sumpworks Posse

description: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
descriptionRaw: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
flavorText: "Not enough resources?! I built my first mechanized contraption with discarded clockwork parts and a rusted thermal capacitor. One must do what one can with what one has!" - Heimerdinger
name: Production Surge

description:
To Play, discard 1.
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, then deal 1 to another.
descriptionRaw:
To Play, discard 1.
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, then deal 1 to another.
flavorText: "Look out!" - Ekko
name: Timewinder

description:
Draw 1.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Parallel Convergence</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
Create a Parallel Convergence in your deck.
flavorText: "Splitting the timelines..." - Ekko
name: Called Shot

description: Start a free attack with an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of each ally.
descriptionRaw: Start a free attack with an exact Ephemeral copy of each ally.
flavorText: "Converging!" - Ekko
name: Parallel Convergence

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Hexite Crystal</style></link> in the bottom 10 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Hexite Crystal in the bottom 10 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "BUT MY PLAAAANNN--MEEEOOOOOW!"
name: Fallen Feline

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Swap my stats with another unit.
descriptionRaw: Play: Swap my stats with another unit.
flavorText:
"A new slotbot? Didn't they shut down the plant that made these years ago?"
"I thought so. Something about 'rolling bombs' and 'unintended conflagration."
"Huh."
"...Wanna play?"
"Absolutely yes."
- Zaunite patrons
name: Defective Swapbot

description: When I'm summoned, create a random Elnuk in the top 6 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random Elnuk in the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "OKAY, LITTLE BUDDY, YOU JUST SIT STILL WHILE I FLIP THIS SWITCHAROO OVER HEEERE AND BOOM! HA! ELNUKS FOREVER! We're totally gonna need more grass. And room." - Practical Perfectionist
name: Volunteer Elnuk

description:
If you see me in a <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Prediction</style></link>, draw me.
Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
If you see me in a Prediction, draw me.
Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Strange how such a small thing could change the world so fundamentally. Strange, too, how that cat seems so intent on getting his paws on a sample. I suspect he enjoys the way light bounces through the crystal!" - Hextech researcher
name: Hexite Crystal

description: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
descriptionRaw: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
flavorText: "We're playing by MY rules." - Ekko
name: Concurrent Timelines

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flame Chompers!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Flame Chompers! in hand.
flavorText: Jinx had a more conventional supplier once, but the two of them had a small falling out. By which we mean, the supplier fell out of a window. By which we mean, the supplier was blown out of a window. By Jinx.
name: Boom Baboon

description: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>, then draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Predict, then draw 1.
flavorText: "The future's what I make it..." - Ekko
name: Time Trick

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. Create 3 copies of the chosen card in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict. Create 3 copies of the chosen card in your deck.
flavorText: "Kay's awesome. She's got that whole 'practice makes perfect' mentality, you know? And boyyy does she practice." - Shomi
name: Practical Perfectionist

description: Swap my Attack and Health with that of another unit.
descriptionRaw: Swap my Attack and Health with that of another unit.
flavorText: "Dealer's choice!" - Defective Swapbot
name: Swapbot's Swap

description: Your cards have -1 cost, <link=keyword.Augment><sprite name=Augment><style=Keyword>Augment</style></link>, are created by <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Glorious Evolution</style></link>, and are now Tech.
descriptionRaw: Your cards have -1 cost, Augment, are created by Glorious Evolution, and are now Tech.
flavorText: "Progress is everything. I will bring the future to this city, whether it is ready or not." - Viktor
name: Glorious Evolution

description: When you summon a Tech, we share keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you summon a Tech, we share keywords.
flavorText: "Ah yes! The Adaptatron 3000! Adaptable, inventive, AND quite the looker! If the fellow could speak, I'm sure we'd have MUCH to share with each other." - Heimerdinger
name: Adaptatron 3000

description: If you see me in a <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Prediction</style></link>, summon me.
descriptionRaw: If you see me in a Prediction, summon me.
flavorText: "Ahh, Shomi's a GENIUS with that hoverboard. I once saw them switch a sumpgrinder into a bottomboard backslide, then catch air with a three-point triple dip! Or something. Look, the point is, they're awesome, okay?" - Practical Perfectionist
name: Dropboarder

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
flavorText: "Little parting gift..." - Pyke
name: Bone Skewer

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Each Lurker ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a random enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Each Lurker ally strikes a random enemy.
flavorText: "Ain't nothin' like a jaull-fish to show you who you can trust, and who you can kill." - Pyke
name: Jaull-fish

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: When a hammersnout breaks a ship's keel, it seems to do it for sheer entertainment. They rarely devour the crew they stranded, instead leaving a feast for the creatures that follow.
name: Redfin Hammersnout

description: When I <link=keyword.Lurker><sprite name=Lurker><style=Keyword>Lurk</style></link>, transform me into <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Death From Below</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I Lurk, transform me into Death From Below.
flavorText:
"...the visions are back again. I see his desperate eyes looking up at me whilst the jaull-fish closed its maw around him. We tried pulling, but the ship was too small, and the beast too big. I had no choice. I had to cut his line. I had to."
- Blood-soaked letter
name: Pyke

description: Summon <link=card.pykeL1><style=AssociatedCard>Pyke</style></link> <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Summon Pyke striking an enemy.
flavorText: "Breach!" - Pyke
name: Death From Below

description:
When I <link=keyword.Lurker><sprite name=Lurker><style=Keyword>Lurk</style></link>, transform me into <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Death From Below</style></link>.
When I kill an enemy, I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw:
When I Lurk, transform me into Death From Below.
When I kill an enemy, I strike the weakest enemy.
flavorText: First he came for his old crew, then other captains, then cheaters, gamblers, and drunkards. Pyke's craving for revenge slowly gave way to a newfound lust for murder. Now, instead of only listing those who once wronged him, his growing manifest only illustrates what Pyke has become.
name: Pyke

description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Pyke</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally strikes an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
Create a Pyke in your deck.
flavorText: "Little parting gift..." - Pyke
name: Pyke's Bone Skewer

description:
Deal 5 to a unit.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: I cost 3 less.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 5 to a unit.
Plunder: I cost 3 less.
flavorText: "The beast's been stuck already, lads! Now stick it again 'til it stops thrashin' and the waters've lost their blue!" - Jagged Taskmaster
name: Monster Harpoon

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Knock 'Em Down</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Powder Keg.
Create a Knock 'Em Down in hand.
flavorText: "Done as you asked, Cap'n. Give 'er a little spark and she'll kick back alright." - Dreadway Deckhand
name: Line 'Em Up

description: For the rest of the round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw: For the rest of the round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, Nab 1.
flavorText: "So, what are you willin' to wager, friend?" - Tahm Kench
name: Loaded Dice

flavorText: "Might not look much, aye, but they're eager for blood. And if you let 'em at you, they'll know where to find it when they're bigger. Best wear yer gloves." - Jaull Hunters
name: Sharkling

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: I start a free attack.
descriptionRaw: Play: I start a free attack.
flavorText:
"Drip, drop, drip, drop, the blood splashes down,
Swim, swim, comes the swarm, better now to drown,
Snip, snap, go the teeth, and we all scream,
To the deep, off we sleep, for forever dreams!"
- Bilgewater nursery rhyme
name: Snapjaw Swarm

description: When allies attack, before <link=keyword.Lurker><sprite name=Lurker><style=Keyword>Lurk</style></link> tries to activate, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>obliterate</style></link> the top card of your deck if it doesn't have <link=keyword.Lurker><sprite name=Lurker><style=Keyword>Lurk</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, before Lurk tries to activate, obliterate the top card of your deck if it doesn't have Lurk.
flavorText: Bilgewater's more treacherous coves soon became home to all manner of sea beasts. There they lie, waiting for the next foolhardy crew to ignore the harbormaster's warnings.
name: Ripper's Bay

description: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
descriptionRaw: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
flavorText: "We're rich!" - Jagged Butcher
name: Lost Riches

description: Deal 1 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to anything.
flavorText: "A little spark, eh? I've just the thing..." - Gangplank
name: Knock 'Em Down

description:
When I count down, summon a random 1 cost follower.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Grant 1 cost allies +2|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I count down, summon a random 1 cost follower.
Countdown 2: Grant 1 cost allies +2|+1 and Fearsome.
flavorText: "Ye think ye've got what it takes to call yourself a Hook, do ye? We'll see, ye tyke. By the time we're done with ye, ye'll either be worth yer weight, or ye'll be weighed down below the waves, bait fer the beasts!" - Petty Officer
name: Reaver's Row

description: Each Lurker ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a random enemy.
descriptionRaw: Each Lurker ally strikes a random enemy.
flavorText: "They hurt. I know." - Pyke
name: Frenzied Feast

description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Snapjaw Swarm</style></link> on top of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Create a Snapjaw Swarm on top of your deck.
flavorText: "If it were up ta me, I'd have a jaull-fish take me afore them bloody things. Sooner go fast than be left screamin' fer me mates to stick me while I'm eaten alive." - Jagged Butcher
name: Bloodbait

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Cast <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Cannon Barrage</style></link> on randomly targeted enemies for each card you've drawn this round, up to 5 times. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: Cast Cannon Barrage on randomly targeted enemies for each card you've drawn this round, up to 5 times.
flavorText: "...Rex?" - Petty Officer
name: Ruined Rex

description: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>. If it's already <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>, the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Grant an enemy Vulnerable. If it's already Vulnerable, the strongest ally starts a free attack Challenging it.
flavorText: "You've got a name, and I've got a list." - Pyke
name: The List

description:
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
<link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw:
Recall a unit.
Blade Dance 1.
flavorText: "Fall back! It's time for another to take center stage!" - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
name: Defiant Dance

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have the attack token, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flawless Duet</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Flawless Duet in hand.
flavorText: "Once we studied art and beauty, and our hearts soared. But when they broke our walls and spilled our blood, we fell back down to earth..."
name: Irelia

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link>, <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link>, or <link=keyword.Burst><sprite name=Burst><style=Keyword>Burst</style></link> spell.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Draw a Slow, Fast, or Burst spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
flavorText: The strange and hauntingly beautiful sky-songs of the Cloud Drinkers kept some of the Black Mist at bay... but only for so long.
name: Scattered Pod

description: Swap <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Irelia</style></link> with an ally.
descriptionRaw: Swap Irelia with an ally.
flavorText: "Follow my lead!" - Irelia
name: Bladesurge

description:
Pick an ally to attack alongside the <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blades</style></link>, then <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 3.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Irelia</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Pick an ally to attack alongside the Blades, then Blade Dance 3.
Create an Irelia in your deck.
flavorText: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia
name: Irelia's Vanguard's Edge

description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have the attack token, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flawless Duet</style></link> in hand.
When allies attack, create a <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Bladesurge</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Flawless Duet in hand.
When allies attack, create a Bladesurge in hand.
flavorText: "...Though our hearts are heavy, we are full of purpose, and return to dance once more."
name: Irelia

description: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 2.
descriptionRaw: Blade Dance 2.
flavorText: "There is no song more perfect than that of two voices entwined in harmony..." - Blossoming Blade
name: Flawless Duet

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 2.
descriptionRaw: Play: Blade Dance 2.
flavorText:
"There are those who think a flower is a fragile, delicate thing. They forget how much strength it takes to hold fast to the humble earth and inspire hope with every bloom."
- Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
name: Blossoming Blade

description: Pick an ally to attack alongside the <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blades</style></link>, then <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 3.
descriptionRaw: Pick an ally to attack alongside the Blades, then Blade Dance 3.
flavorText: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia
name: Vanguard's Edge

description: When I'm <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link>, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm Recalled, draw 1.
flavorText: "Water is flexible, adaptive - it will take the form most needed in the moment, flowing forth or retreating from the shore." - Ionian monk
name: Dancing Droplet

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if an ally has <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if an ally has Ephemeral.
flavorText: "You are smoke—a whisper on the wind. Your fists must join with the dark like shade to shadow. Now... again!" - Mistress Shi
name: Shadow Apprentice

description:
When you <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link>, I attack with the <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blades</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw:
When you Blade Dance, I attack with the Blades.
Play: Blade Dance 1.
flavorText: "Gather round, my darlings. Today our feet will glide 'cross the ground that nourished us, with the movements our families taught us. We are children of Ionia, and today we dance for art, for freedom, for each other!"
name: Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> me when I leave combat.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate me when I leave combat.
flavorText: "Keep your skills sharp--it is not only the blade that strikes, but the hand behind it." - Irelia
name: Blade

description: Swap 2 allies.
descriptionRaw: Swap 2 allies.
flavorText: "To dance is to move in harmony with the motions of all things." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
name: Syncopation

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flawless Duet</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to create a Flawless Duet in hand.
flavorText: "Our performance will be... unforgettable." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
name: Lead and Follow

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Draw a Slow spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
flavorText: "I know their songs. This is a song of mourning." - Ionian farmer
name: Scattered Pod

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Draw a Fast spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
flavorText: "I know their songs. This is a song of mourning." - Ionian farmer
name: Scattered Pod

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=keyword.Burst><sprite name=Burst><style=Keyword>Burst</style></link> spell.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Draw a Burst spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
flavorText: "I know their songs. This is a song of mourning." - Ionian farmer
name: Scattered Pod

description: When I'm summoned, draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Shen</style></link>. Allies with <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> have <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a Shen. Allies with Barrier have Double Attack.
flavorText: "Just as we fight to protect the land, the land itself rises up to defend us. We draw strength from the earth's wrath and drive out our enemies. And so, balance remains." - Ionian Priest
name: Sacred Protector

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> each ally and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
descriptionRaw: Recall each ally and summon a Living Shadow in its place.
flavorText: "Let them strike at shadows, where their weapons will find no purchase." - Zed
name: Shadows of the Past

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Blade Dance 1.
flavorText: "What a shame, boys! All that power and just no rhythm to match it? We can't ALL be stars, I guess...!"
name: Ribbon Dancer

description: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1.
flavorText: For some, music is a shared refuge from hardship and violence. For others, music is resistance.
name: Field Musicians

description: When you summon an ally, give me +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally, give me +2|+0 this round.
flavorText:
My dearest Kay, 
They arrived this morning in a line of ships that broke the horizon and blotted out the sunrise. Their machines set fire to the Silver Plains, and now a thick smoke crawls through the summer air. We can stand by no longer. Rake or shovel, scythe or sword, today we must go to meet our destiny. 
Know that I love you and our home more than I have words to write.
- Charred letter
name: Coastal Defender

description:
To Play, place a card from your hand into your deck.
<link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>, then create an exact copy of the chosen card in hand.
descriptionRaw:
To Play, place a card from your hand into your deck.
Predict, then create an exact copy of the chosen card in hand.
flavorText: "The actions we take today plant seeds for future trees." - Tai, Aspiring Chronomancer
name: Careful Preparation

description:
Give an enemy follower <nobr>-4|-0</nobr> this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
descriptionRaw:
Give an enemy follower -4|-0 this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
flavorText: "The sun will shine again upon Shuriman lands." - Voice of the Risen
name: Unworthy

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy -1|-0 and Vulnerable.
flavorText: Each grain she spills takes a second from their lives, wearing away at them like wind.
name: Baccai Sandspinner

description: Destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
flavorText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.
name: Rite of Negation

description: Kill an ally to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
flavorText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.
name: Rite of Negation

description: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
flavorText: "I saw her speak, long ago." The old soldier smiled, and for an instant, his granddaughter could picture it: Shurima, gold and gleaming, proud Azir standing over the city heralded by the Voice of the Risen. "She stirred in us all a passion we thought long lost."
name: Voice of the Risen

description:
When I <link=keyword.Lurker><sprite name=Lurker><style=Keyword>Lurk</style></link> or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant Lurker allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Place me into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
When I Lurk or Attack: Grant Lurker allies everywhere +1|+0.
Round End: Place me into your deck.
flavorText: "Young Jhuraa was exploring, as is his way, and in a small hidden cave, discovered some ancient texts! We took them to a translator in Marrowmark, and the scrolls... they speak of an ancient terror who stalked our ancestors. A queen. A xer'sai queen!" - Fezhaur, Vekauran elder
name: Rek'Sai

description:
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck.
Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Rek'Sai</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck.
Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
Create a Rek'Sai in your deck.
flavorText:
"May the sun shine, and may the xer'sai sleep."
- Merchant's prayer
name: Rek'Sai's Call the Pack

description:
When I level up, create 3 random Lurkers in hand.
When I <link=keyword.Lurker><sprite name=Lurker><style=Keyword>Lurk</style></link> or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant Lurker allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
When I level up, create 3 random Lurkers in hand.
When I Lurk or Attack: Grant Lurker allies everywhere +1|+0.
flavorText: "We have known of her terror for generations, but for our ancestors to know her, too? How old must she be? How many of our people has she butchered? The thought unsettles me greatly." - Fezhaur, Vekauran elder
name: Rek'Sai

description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round. If you have leveled a champion this game, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>The Absolver's Return</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+1 this round. If you have leveled a champion this game, create a The Absolver's Return in hand.
flavorText: "Everyone told me not to use this. 'No one must wield such a powerful weapon,' they said." - Akshan
name: The Absolver

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavorText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Desert Naturalist

description: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavorText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Teen Spirit

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "When this here croc was born, the others took bets on how long he'd live, assuming he was the runt of the litter and a freak to boot. Nobody thought to bet on him eatin' all his siblings. Heh."
name: Raz Bloodmane

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: Few are taught the ways of the desert, and even fewer given the ability to command its sands as Azir can. To wield this power and know the secrets of the sands is a gift given only to Azir's most faithful and capable followers.
name: Sandcrafter

description:
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck.
Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
descriptionRaw:
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck.
Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
flavorText:
"May the sun shine, and may the xer'sai sleep."
- Merchant's prayer
name: Call the Pack

description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText: "Sure, I've had good days and bad days, just like anyone. In this line of work, the bad days can get real bad, and the good days can get real rich." - Sivir
name: Payday

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Clockling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Predict.
Countdown 2: Summon a Clockling.
flavorText: Though they might otherwise be thought of as lost to time, buried underneath years of sand, the automata were precisely placed, simply waiting to be awakened.
name: Ancient Preparations

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Waking Sands</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Waking Sands in hand.
flavorText: "Okay, Davu. You're gonna go in there, grab that... whatever it is, and you're going to make us rich. Me rich. You're going to make me rich. Got it? Also, if that's a trapped thing, I am real sorry in advance."
name: Treasure Seeker

description: When you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, grant me +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you slay a unit, grant me +1|+0.
flavorText: "The baccai all fled or were spared following their failed Ascension, and none have seen them since. Who knows how long they have hidden in those dark tombs, bearing the mark of their shame?" - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Baccai Reaper

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavorText:
"MY NAME IS ZAIFA AND I LIKE WRITING STUPID THINGS IN MY STUPID BOOK WHEN I THINK EVERYONE ELSE IS ASLEEP. EVEN SAMI."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Hibernating Rockbear

description: <link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 2. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Reputation: I cost 2.
flavorText: The soldier struggled as he reached for his spear, but she leaned harder on his chest until he ceased, groaning. "No, no," she admonished, showing her sharpened eyeteeth with a wicked smile. "This is mine, now."
name: Callous Bonecrusher

flavorText: Before the vaults, Shurima's mercenaries and tomb robbers must learn to survive the desert's more overt threats. First, the unrelenting heat. Second, the multitude of raiders, hellbent on carnage.
name: Ruin Runner

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create 4 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time Bombs</style></link> in your deck, then <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create 4 Time Bombs in your deck, then Predict.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you destroy 2 allied Time Bombs.
flavorText: Over many years, Zilean established a network of promising young mages from different times, all of whom were capable of seeing out his life's work should the unthinkable happen. Although a kind and encouraging mentor, deep sorrow creased his brow when he sought solitude, and there was a weariness in his eyes that only someone who has lived multiple lifetimes could hope to comprehend.
name: Zilean

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1 and <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> other allied Time Bombs 1 round.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1 and advance other allied Time Bombs 1 round.
Countdown 1: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Using time "constructively" can also mean "destructively."
name: Time Bomb

description:
Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Zilean</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
Create a Zilean in your deck.
flavorText: "We cannot stop the inevitable... but we can postpone it." - Zilean
name: Zilean's Chronoshift

description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of each non-<link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> card I saw you play last round.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create 4 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time Bombs</style></link> in your deck, then <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Round Start: Create a Fleeting copy of each non-Fleeting card I saw you play last round.
Play: Create 4 Time Bombs in your deck, then Predict.
flavorText: Countless possibilities stretched before and behind him. He saw them all at once, a dizzying array that only he could decipher. With a single gesture, Zilean could unfold entire timelines -- but none had yet shown him how to save Icathia.
name: Zilean

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
flavorText:
"The nomad's step is always light, for it is unburdened by the weight of roots, and their home is forever beyond the horizon."
- The Societies of Shurima
name: Taliyah

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark. 
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to my blocker 3 times. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark. 
Attack: Deal 2 to my blocker 3 times. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: Taliyah left Ionia after hearing word of monumental change in her homeland. She returned to Shurima to find an emperor reborn, her people fraught, and the xer'sai more active than ever. She had no choice but to grow beyond her years.
name: Taliyah

description: Deal 2 to <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Taliyah</style></link>'s blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to Taliyah's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: "Throw another rock!" - Taliyah
name: Threaded Volley

description:
Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Taliyah</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
Create a Taliyah in your deck.
flavorText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah
name: Taliyah's Stoneweaving

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predicted</style></link> this game.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've Predicted this game.
flavorText:
"Remember what we learned," Zilean said, his voice unusually soft - grave, even. "Are you certain you're ready?"
Khahiri gave his mentor a reassuring smile. "I'll be back soon. And besides, I've spent every day for years preparing for this moment. If not now, when?"
name: Khahiri the Student

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +2|+2. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the strongest ally +2|+2.
flavorText: A Shuriman saltworker quickly learns which deposits are suitable for collection, and which are best left alone.
name: Salt Spire

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: "When Azir took up the mantle as emperor of Shurima, he was arrogant. Blind. He accumulated power and planned his Ascension so that he might stand as ruler over not just Shurima, but the entire world." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Azir

description:
When I level up, replace your deck with the Emperor's Deck, then draw 1.
When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I level up, replace your deck with the Emperor's Deck, then draw 1.
When allies attack, summon an attacking Sandstone Charger.
flavorText:
"The Emperor Azir, though haughty, is generous. Above all, he cares deeply for those who would march alongside him into Shurima's golden future, as the nation rises anew, its people once again united under his rule." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Azir

description:
When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
When you summon an ally, give us both +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
When you summon an ally, give us both +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Short of fulfilling his destiny, Azir's lifelong friend - and newly named brother - hatefully cast him off the dais. In that fateful moment Shurima was cursed, doomed to ruin for thousands of years to follow." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Azir

flavorText: "They appeared out of nowhere, made up of swirling sands! Then, after they had dispatched our forces, their forms simply... disappeared, melted back into the desert." - Desert Survivor
name: Sandstone Charger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> and <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link> and grant them +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Play and Round Start: Summon 2 Sand Soldiers and grant them +2|+2.
flavorText: Now more powerful than ever, Azir has raised his most loyal soldiers to lead his armies.
name: Golden Herald

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Arise!</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Azir</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
Create a Azir in your deck.
flavorText: "The order is given." - Azir
name: Azir's Arise!

description:
Enemies are <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Enemies are Vulnerable.
Round Start: Rally.
flavorText: "Observe our god-emperor! He knows the power of these lands better than any, and his army only grows. Shurima is risen, and it shall never fall again!" - Voice of the Risen
name: General's Palace

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Azir's legions were reputed to be unstoppable even before Shurima was reborn, but now they are truly innumerable.
name: Sand Soldier

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: The <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy and I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Round End: The Strongest enemy and I strike each other.
flavorText: "Behold! See how our champion sits astride the lion? Even the king of beasts would yield to his power, for he is the Will of Azir!" - Voice of the Risen
name: Eternal Gladiator

description:
<link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy follower.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Obliterate an enemy follower.
Draw 1.
flavorText: "Those who oppose us will be reduced to dust." - Azir
name: Crumbling Sands

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> 3 enemy units or landmarks.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate 3 enemy units or landmarks.
flavorText: The storm rolls in with a peal like thunder, and when it passes, it leaves nothing behind.
name: Sandstorm

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
flavorText: The emperor's golden guard moves as one, a succession of regimented warriors that is as terrifying as it is impressive to behold.
name: Emperor's Guard

description:
Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral.
Draw 1.
flavorText: Between the sand, the sun, and the heat, it can be difficult to tell what is real, and what is merely a mirage.
name: Shimmering Mirage

description:
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Renekton</style></link> and <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Nasus</style></link>. Immediately level them up to level 3.
descriptionRaw:
Rally.
Summon Renekton and Nasus. Immediately level them up to level 3.
flavorText: "They will serve their emperor. My generals will make sure of it." - Azir
name: Ascended's Call

description: Draw 2.
descriptionRaw: Draw 2.
flavorText: Birds found in the desert climes are all considered symbols of Azir, and Shurimans find their presence a good omen.
name: Emperor's Prosperity

description: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
flavorText: The Void is full of surprises, growing every day and finding new ways to infiltrate the tower, as intrusive as a thorned blindbrush but infinitely more deadly. Inasmuch, the study of it proves difficult, as it requires similarly clever and resourceful researchers to anticipate and understand the threat.
name: Xenotype Researchers

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Warlord's Palace</style></link> or <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> it 1 round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Strike: Summon a Warlord's Palace or advance it 1 round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Warlord's Palace has finished its Countdown.
flavorText: "The Sentinels' code seems full of complicated restrictions. Things like 'Never take a life in the name of vengeance' and 'Fight for the world, never for yourself'. As for me..."
name: Akshan

description:
An ally you've targeted this round <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Akshan</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally you've targeted this round strikes an enemy.
Create an Akshan in your deck.
flavorText: "They never expect the grappling hook!" - Akshan
name: Akshan's Grappling Hook

description: When I'm summoned, level up, or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Warlord's Hoard</style></link> or <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> it 1 round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, level up, or Strike: Summon a Warlord's Hoard or advance it 1 round.
flavorText: "My code is far simpler--disregard any rule that prevents me from doing whatever I want."
name: Akshan

description:
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 8</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create a <link=card.discover><style=AssociatedCard>Relic of Power</style></link> in hand.
When you target allies <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> me 1.
descriptionRaw:
Countdown 8: Create a Relic of Power in hand.
When you target allies advance me 1.
flavorText: "See that eyesore of a building? That's where the swine lives. We'll take him out, grab the loot, and be back in time for dinner." - Vekauran Vagabond
name: Warlord's Palace

description:
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 8</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sentinel's Hoard</style></link> in hand.
When you target allies <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> me 1.
descriptionRaw:
Countdown 8: Create a Sentinel's Hoard in hand.
When you target allies advance me 1.
flavorText: When a group of survivors from the fallen city of Vekaura learned of a particular warlord's sordid history, they wasted no time making plans to seize his ill-gotten gains.
name: Warlord's Hoard

description: Cast a <link=card.choice3><style=AssociatedCard>The Absolver's Resurrection</style></link>, a <link=card.choice2><style=AssociatedCard>Fount of Power</style></link>, or a <link=card.choice1><style=AssociatedCard>Shield of the Sentinels</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Cast a The Absolver's Resurrection, a Fount of Power, or a Shield of the Sentinels.
flavorText: Before the thief could even reach for her tools, a pale green fog enveloped the box, coaxing it open with a cold whisper.
name: Sentinel's Hoard

description: Draw 2. Your cards cost 1 less this round.
descriptionRaw: Draw 2. Your cards cost 1 less this round.
flavorText: "My love... Why won't you answer? Please. Answer me, Isolde. ANSWER ME!" - Viego
name: Fount of Power

description: Grant all enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and create in hand a 0 cost copy of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally that died this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant all enemies Vulnerable and create in hand a 0 cost copy of the strongest ally that died this game.
flavorText: "Fate is what I make it." - Akshan
name: The Absolver's Resurrection

description: Grant your champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> and +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant your champions everywhere SpellShield and +2|+2.
flavorText: The Sentinels of Light trace their heritage back to blessed Helia. The relic stones they saved from the Ruination would become the world's greatest defense against the darkness of the Black Mist.
name: Shield of the Sentinels

description: Pick 1 - <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link> then draw 1, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>, or grant all allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Pick 1 - Predict then draw 1, summon a Sandstone Charger, or grant all allies +1|+0.
flavorText: The Black Mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.
name: Relic of Power

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Sandstone Charger.
flavorText: The mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.
name: Relic of Power

description: Grant all allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Grant all allies +1|+0.
flavorText: The mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.
name: Relic of Power

description: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>, then draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Predict, then draw 1.
flavorText: The mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.
name: Relic of Power

description:
Grant allied <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Grant allied Sand Soldiers everywhere +1|+0.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
flavorText: They do not rest. They do not hesitate. They are uncompromising, unfeeling, unyielding.
name: Desert's Wrath

description: When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I Challenge an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
flavorText: "It could be easily forgotten that he was once human, for the visage of the crocodile fits his love for bloody battle so well..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link>When I block or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When I block or Attack: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "When he finally has a chance at revenge on his brother Nasus, Renekton will stop at nothing. He will destroy all, and Shurima will again be left a ruin." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +3|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give me +3|+3 this round.
flavorText: "So many long years in the dark with that betrayer filling his head with words of hate and resentment, breeding contempt for his brother. It only fueled his rage, made him stronger." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Renekton</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
Create a Renekton in your deck.
flavorText: "Shred them!" - Renekton
name: Renekton's Ruthless Predator

description: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "I will spare no one!" - Renekton
name: Dominus Destruction

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Overwhelm and +2|+1 this round.
flavorText: "Eh. Who cares?" - Akshan
name: The Absolver's Return

description: Create a random landmark with <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> in hand, or <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> your landmarks 1 round.
descriptionRaw: Create a random landmark with Countdown in hand, or advance your landmarks 1 round.
flavorText: "Time is evanescent." - Zilean
name: Imagined Possibilities

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 3. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
flavorText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir
name: Ricochet

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict.
flavorText: Not all xer'sai are born to butcher. Some can summon their kin with piercing shrieks that rattle the sands as well as the senses.
name: Xer'Sai Caller

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +3|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +3|+1 instead.
flavorText: "With the land's help, we WILL defend ourselves!" - Taliyah
name: Shaped Stone

description:
<link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw:
Predict.
Give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "I have seen my destiny, and this time, I will not be stopped." - Azir
name: Scrying Sands

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Roiling Sands.
flavorText:
"Today, we began our journey to Nashramae! Samir is determined to cross the Great Sai before the next full moon, and is making SUCH a mess of things! I did not know a simple sandboard could collapse a whole dune. Neither did Sami. He's fine."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Rock Hopper

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>Advance</style></link> an allied landmark 3 rounds.
descriptionRaw: Play: Advance an allied landmark 3 rounds.
flavorText: Whenever he seeks a moment's peace, Zilean returns to Icathia's last garden, just as he remembers it.
name: Preservationist

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Warlord's Palace</style></link> or <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> it 2 rounds.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Warlord's Palace or advance it 2 rounds.
flavorText: Seeing Akshan hanging underneath the fourth-floor window, Najah cursed under her breath. Pretty boy beat her to the mark. Again. Turning her dagger over in her hand, she pondered what to say to him. Maybe this time, he'd finally acknowledge her.
name: Vekauran Vagabond

description:
Deal 4 to a unit.
Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 4 to a unit.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
flavorText: "Go. Surround them. They cannot fight the land itself." - Azir
name: Shifting Sands

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Arise!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
flavorText: "The order is given." - Azir
name: Arise!

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 0. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Finds</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 0. 
Countdown 1: Create 2 Lucky Finds in hand.
flavorText: "Some maps take years to decipher, some traps takes months to disarm, and some vaults take weeks to navigate. But the times you pull it off? They're worth every damned second." - Sivir
name: Inner Sanctum

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText: "My friend, for you I've procured this incomparable beauty straight from the fabled Tomb of the Emperors and pulled it right from the hand of the great Renekton himself and as I rode out, I was surrounded by ten--twenty!--bloodthirsty sauren riders! Truly, a miracle that such a treasure has made it to your hands."
name: Profiteer

description: <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Fearsome
flavorText: "Yeah, you better be afraid." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Overwhelm
flavorText: "If I can't get past you, I'll just go through you." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Quick Attack
flavorText: "Quick as a flash." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

flavorText: "The best just got better." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Challenger
flavorText: "Try turning me down." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Tough
flavorText: "Can't spend your earnings if you're dead." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

flavorText: "Let's cut 'em down to size." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

flavorText: "Go on. Gimme your best shot. Then it's my turn." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>
descriptionRaw: SpellShield
flavorText: "Your tricks ain't worth the sand you're standing on, kid." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

description: Pick a buff from among 3 to grant an ally.
descriptionRaw: Pick a buff from among 3 to grant an ally.
flavorText: "Nothin' better than a payday." - Sivir
name: Lucky Find

flavorText: Sivir made her way through life as a mercenary, and burdened herself with all the risks and rewards that came with her choice. One fateful expedition almost cost her everything, but as her blood seeped into Shurima's sands, it awoke an ancient power that would return both her and her homeland to greatness.
name: Sivir

description: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: To receive the blessing of Azir is a great honor - to give a blessing in his name, an honor greater still.
name: Inspiring Marshal

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: "And... there. Tied up, nice 'n pretty. Renekton likes his meals delivered still-squirming."
name: Merciless Hunter

description: <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>Advance</style></link> your landmarks 1 round.
descriptionRaw: Advance your landmarks 1 round.
flavorText: "Time is evanescent." - Zilean
name: Imagined Possibilities

description: Create a random landmark with <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a random landmark with Countdown in hand.
flavorText: "Time is evanescent." - Zilean
name: Imagined Possibilities

description: When an enemy is summoned, destroy me to grant it <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When an enemy is summoned, destroy me to grant it Vulnerable.
flavorText: Centuries of missteps have taught the Shurimans how to read the sands. Only they know which expanses will stand firm, and which give way. It is all the same to the layman observer.
name: Roiling Sands

description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon an exact copy of the <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterated</style></link> unit I replaced.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 1: Summon an exact copy of the Obliterated unit I replaced.
flavorText:
"I like to think of this as 'capturing a moment'." 
"Ha. Clever."
- Xetsa and Zinsa, Void Researchers
name: Stasis Statue

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: If I have 8+ Power, give me <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>, <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: If I have 8+ Power, give me Fearsome, Overwhelm, and SpellShield this round.
flavorText: "It is said that hundreds of years ago, the river Khaleek bore a great trading outpost known as Taraleek upon its shores. That is, until one fateful day, when a mighty beast broke through the ground, and annihilated both the outpost and all who called it home. But what monster could do such a thing?" - Shuriman historian
name: Xerxa'reth, The Undertitan

description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Instant Centuries</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Instant Centuries in hand.
flavorText: The constant rumble in the lower levels of the tower are due to The Clock Hand, the tower guardian that steadily winds the gears below.
name: The Clock Hand

description: Summon a random landmark with <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link>, or <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> a landmark 4 rounds.
descriptionRaw: Summon a random landmark with Countdown, or advance a landmark 4 rounds.
flavorText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'..." - Zilean
name: Instant Century

description: <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>Advance</style></link> a landmark 4 rounds.
descriptionRaw: Advance a landmark 4 rounds.
flavorText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'." - Zilean
name: Instant Century

description: Summon a random landmark with <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a random landmark with Countdown.
flavorText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'." - Zilean
name: Instant Century

description:
Draw 1.
If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> a unit this round, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
If you've slain a unit this round, drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Sandthrashers primarily recruit from their enemy's ranks. Whoever survives their initial assault is invited to join, or die.
name: Ruinous Path

description: Give enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round and summon 6 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give enemies Vulnerable this round and summon 6 Sand Soldiers.
flavorText: "My soldiers march on." - Azir
name: Emperor's Divide

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "We fight, they bleed!" - Renekton
name: Rite of Dominance

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 4+ units this game, an enemy and I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: If you've slain 4+ units this game, an enemy and I strike each other.
flavorText: The bearer of a grudge's resentment only deepens, even if those they bear the grudge against are long dead.
name: Rampaging Baccai

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Exalted Poro</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into Exalted Poro.
flavorText: She didn't know what she had found, precisely... but it was shiny, and looked like a good snack.
name: Destined Poro

description: I have 3 random keywords.
descriptionRaw: I have 3 random keywords.
flavorText: As far as divine rulers go, she's awfully fond of snax.
name: Exalted Poro

description: Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy -2|-0 and Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: Desert-dwellers know how to avoid the sun's searing and relentless heat, but those unprepared to withstand it will find their strength and energy sapped at remarkable speed.
name: Exhaust

description:
Summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Summon 2 Roiling Sands.
Draw 1.
flavorText: As beautiful as the Great Sai may be, it is not a place for the weak. Many lives have been lost among its rolling dunes, and while the xer'sai claim many, the land itself takes its share.
name: Unraveled Earth

description: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
descriptionRaw: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
flavorText: "The future will be written by the Ascended!" - Azir
name: Ascended's Rise

description: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
flavorText: "Nasus' newly won blessing allowed him countless lifetimes to spend in study and contemplation over the nature of life and death. But this same extended lifespan would, after the fall of Shurima, also prove to be his curse." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Nasus

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: If you've slain 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
flavorText: The baccai are tasked with defending the inner sanctum to safeguard the ancient treasures there, and for the sake of mortals that might think themselves clever enough, or mighty enough, to withstand the weight of the Curator's judgment.
name: Sanctum Conservator

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Sand Soldier.
flavorText: "As the emperor commands, both the sand and I obey."
name: Dunekeeper

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
flavorText: "Our shining future lies just beneath the sands, and it is up to us to pave the way for Azir. The golden empire in the desert will rise again!"
name: Golden Ambassador

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict.
flavorText: Throughout his time as a student of chronomancy, Tai had to reconcile his uncertainty with his determination. It was better to have hope in a potential victory than to dwell on what could possibly go wrong.
name: Aspiring Chronomancer

flavorText: While all xer'sai are able tunnelers, only their dunebreakers have the mass and power needed to break through the veins of solid bedrock that snake through the Great Sai, and open up the lands beyond for further hunting.
name: Xer'sai Dunebreaker

description: <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Rampaging Baccai</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Rampaging Baccai and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: The baccai are twisted, warped versions of what they might have been - had they become part of the Ascended Host - and the rage they feel at their failure must be unleashed somewhere.
name: Baccai Rampage

description: Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
descriptionRaw: Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
flavorText: "We cannot stop the inevitable... but we can postpone it." - Zilean
name: Chronoshift

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Countdown 2: Draw 1.
flavorText: Zilean shows those he brings to the tower what, precisely, they are looking to restore. The Preservationist is able to show them, if only a glimpse at a time.
name: Preservarium

description:
Start of Game: Draw 1 of me if all your cards are Shuriman.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 25</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=vocab.SunDiscRestore><style=Vocab>Restore the Sun Disc</style></link>.
When an Ascended ally levels up, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> me 10 rounds.
descriptionRaw:
Start of Game: Draw 1 of me if all your cards are Shuriman.
Countdown 25: Restore the Sun Disc.
When an Ascended ally levels up, advance me 10 rounds.
flavorText: When Azir beheld the Shuriman capital's Sun Disc, he saw it not for what it was, but what it could be--the key to returning Shurima to its former glory.
name: Buried Sun Disc

description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw:
An ally strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus
name: Siphoning Strike

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: Tena waited patiently as her pet's caustic spittle wore away the gilded bars of the palace's rear gate. Around the corner, she would soon find a hoard of unspeakably valuable treasure--more than enough to bring Vekaura back to its former glory.
name: Vekauran Safecracker

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> and <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes the strongest and weakest enemies.
flavorText: "Better duck." - Sivir
name: Boomerang Blade

description: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link> and <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> an allied landmark 2 rounds.
descriptionRaw: Predict and advance an allied landmark 2 rounds.
flavorText: "If only you saw time as I do, you would know it is not immutable." - Zilean
name: Time in a Bottle

flavorText: The Clocklings were the first to wriggle free - precisely at the time Zilean had set them to wake up. They shook themselves off and went clambering over the ancient walls, seeking others of their kind.
name: Clockling

description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nasus</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
Create a Nasus in your deck.
flavorText: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus
name: Nasus' Siphoning Strike

description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
Enemies have <nobr>-3|-0</nobr>.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game. 
Enemies have -3|-0.
flavorText: "His hope revived by Shurima's rise, Nasus finally returned after years spent wandering the desert, eager to make amends with his brother. He never suspected he would find Renekton maddened by years spent suffering at Xerath's hands in the tomb, waiting for him." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Nasus

description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
Enemies have <nobr>-1|-0</nobr>.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game. 
Enemies have -1|-0.
flavorText: "For years, Nasus and his brother Renekton served the empire. Nasus was a scholar, Renekton a fierce warrior. It was not until the two were called upon to confront the betrayer, Xerath, that Nasus was forced to make a terrible choice..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Nasus

description: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Prediction</style></link>, grant all allied copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a Prediction, grant all allied copies of me everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: Khahiri had only been gone a moment when he suddenly reappeared. Older by nearly a decade and wielding a strange and deadly-looking weapon, he was met with gasps of awe and concern.
name: Khahiri the Returned

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
flavorText: "I have sworn myself to Azir, and to Shurima, my home! Will you not do the same?"
name: Devoted Council

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Buried Sun Disc</style></link> 3 rounds.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, advance your Buried Sun Disc 3 rounds.
